profile_positions.description: Team member on the global roll out team of the Business Operations Transformation (BOT).
profile_positions.title: Process Development Specialist, R2R / FP&A

profile_positions.description:
Team member on the NL country roll out team of the Business Operations Transformation (BOT).
•	Responsible for: Record to Report stream; Treasury Operations stream; Travel & Expense claim process; Invoices and payments in Source to Pay; Intercompany transactions in Order to Cash; Salary process.
•	The role is to ensure that the Dutch specifics are included in the design of the future processes and systems, and are in line with Dutch Gaap; ensuring compliance to rules and regulations in reporting.
•	Using NL specific knowledge of the as-is processes to ensure localizations are designed where needed into the global template.
•	Identifying the relevant stakeholders, and ensuring that they understand the changes, and where needed can align to the future processes to ensure successful implementation.
•	Understanding the future way of working of the end to end process to train the country users. 
•	Review desktop procedures to ensure country specifics are captured well to ensure continuation of day to day transactions after go live.
•	Assisting in evaluating accuracy and completeness of transactions for data migration
profile_positions.title: Subject Matter Expert for Record to Report and Treasury Operations

profile_positions.description:
Ensure the quality of Accounting and Reporting is in compliance with standards, policies, rules and regulations.
Contribute to the implementations of changes from global and local directions for business transformation.
profile_positions.title: Country Accounting Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Audit assistant on international audits and audits in general.
• Worked as senior audit assistant, assisting the junior manager with audits and reviews of various Manufacturing, Import and retail, Investment holding companies
• Performed audits of Financial Statements in accordance with the International Financial Reporting Standard  (IFRS), Dutch GAAP and International Standard of Auditing.
• Exposure to testing compliance with Sarbanes-Oxley Act (SOX)
• Performed consolidations based on IFRS presentation
• Since middle November 2017 assisted the technical department with IFRS financial statement reviews on Fridays and Dutch Corporate Governance reporting.
profile_positions.title: Senior Audit Associate

profile_positions.description:
• Planning audits of entities and auditing in accordance with International Auditing Standards 
• Drafting Financial statements using IFRS and IFRS for SME’s
• Reporting to client management and all  related tasks to be performed to finalise audits
• Managing a small audit team (supervision of 4 individuals)
• Reviewing work of junior associates which increased efficiency for Manager review
profile_positions.title: Audit Junior Manager

profile_positions.description:
I commenced my articles with PKF, who merged with Grant Thornton at the beginning of my third and final year of articles/traineeship. 
I have gained experience in various industries (where I mostly audited retail entities and property rental companies).
My roll changes from year to year, where in my final year as Audit Trainee Accountant I was managing a small team of up to 5 people, and reporting to the manager. 
• The roll consisted of planning audits in line with International Auditing Standards; and responsibiliites included planning, execution and completion of various company and group audits as the audit senior. Assisted in the assessment of operational and financial risks. Performed control, substantive and analytical procedures/analyses to detect unusual financial statement relationships. 
• Evaluating internal controls relevant to the performance of the statutory audit and reporting to management material weakness in such systems 
• Providing guidance, technical assistance/coaching and on the job training to the audit team reporting to me  to achieve effective and timely completion of work, through supervision and oversight of to ensure that work milestones are set, and adequate.
• During my traineeship at Grant Thornton Cape Town I successfully completed the exams through SAICA and IRBA and at the end of my traineeshipt I registered at South African Institute of Chartered Accountants (SAICA) as a CA(SA).
profile_positions.title: Audit Trainee Accountant
